content: row 1 to 6 knit bottom back of the body cast off all sts bow blue tit wings make 2 per bird cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm bow single pointed needles and pale blue yarn start at make 1 cast the top body edge on 22 sts using row 1 rs k1 kfb kfb sl1 wyif 6 sts 3 25mm single pointed needles and lavender yarn row 2 ws k5 sl1 wyif row 1 rs knit row 3 k1 kfb k2 kfb sl1 wyif 8 sts row 2 ws k2 p18 k2 row 4 to 8 k7 sl1 wyif row 3 to 90 repeat row 1 to 2 forty-four more row 9 knit to last 3 sts k2tog sl1 wyif 7 sts times row 10 to 13 repeat row 9 four more times 3 sts cast off all sts row 14 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts pull through to cast off bow centre make 1 cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm single pointed making up use the beak cast on/off tails to sew needles and lavender yarn the beak onto the body at the marked stitch and row 1 to 19 knit remove the marker using graphite grey yarn and running back stitch embroider a vertical line over cast off all sts the pale cream yarn stripe below the beak then sew the side edges of the body decrease stuffing as you bow ends sew and gather the cast on sts decrease at the bottom sew on buttons eyes on either side of the beak make 1 make a slip knot on a 3 25mm needle in with a 5 stitch gap on either side between the eye lavender yarn spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 8 of 15 row 1 rs kfb 2 sts bunny row 2 ws knit row 3 kfb knit to end 3 sts bunny body row 4 to 7 repeat row 2 to 3 twice more 5 sts make 1 per bunny cast on 10 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles row 8 k2 purl to the last 2 sts k2 and pale grey yarn start at the row 9 kfb knit to end 6 sts bottom row 10 to 21 repeat row 8 to 9 six more times row 1 to 2 starting on a rs 12 sts knit row work 2 row in st st row 22 k2 p8 k2 row 3 k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row 23 knit row 4 to 15 starting on a ws purl row work 12 row 24 k2 purl to the last 2 sts k2 row in st st row 25 k1 k2tog knit to end 11 sts row 16 p2 p2tog p1 5 times p1 13 sts row 26 to 39 repeat row 24 to 25 seven more cast off all sts times 4 sts row 40 k4 bunny head row 41 k1 k2tog k1 3 sts make 1 per bunny cast on 10 sts using
